question: Which of the following condition favours callus induction?

choices.value: Temperature of 25°C ± 5°C with 12 hours of photoperiod
Temperature of 25°C ± 2°C with 18 hours of photoperiod
Temperature of 25°C + 5°C with 14 hours of photoperiod
Temperature of 25°C ± 2°C with 16 hours of photoperiod
